biography: Joni, a name synonymous with the Hill Side Golf Club, is known for his reserved demeanor off the course, which sharply contrasts with his aggressive play style when competing. Some say that Joni transforms into a different person entirely when he picks up a golf club, shedding his quiet nature for a fierce competitive spirit.

Joni's participation in past Hector Trophée events is notable. He has appeared once in the tournament and has secured one victory to date, a testament to his skill and determination. While he has not yet claimed the Victor Trophy for individual performance, his focus on team success has been evident throughout his career.

Although Joni is considered to be retired from Hector Trophée events, his legacy remains a source of inspiration. While he will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025, the possibility of a return, however slim, keeps fans hopeful.
